overview_of_class: This course introduces photographic equipment, materials and processes. Extensive darkroom instruction will emphasize high-quality black-and-white printing and creative darkroom control. Classroom discussion and lectures will explore the aesthetics of camera vision. No previous studio experience necessary. Bring camera (35-mm operable with automatic settings off) and one roll of Tri-X black-and-white 36-exposure film to first class. Enrollment is limited to 12. May not be audited or taken P/N.
name: Introduction to Photography
subject: ART
